data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: (a doubly imperfect verb) To live, be alive, be ashamed, spend (the night) awake, fertilize the earth, keep anyone alive; spare any one, let anyone alive, remove prudency, modesty and shamefulness, make immodest
data.sentence: The word الْحَيَوةِ comes from the root ح ي ي and is associated with the meanings: (a doubly imperfect verb) To live, be alive, be ashamed, spend (the night) awake, fertilize the earth, keep anyone alive; spare any one, let anyone alive, remove prudency, modesty and shamefulness, make immodest

data.meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.
data.sentence: The word الدُّنْيَا comes from the root د ن و and is associated with the meanings: (Dal-Nun-Alif) To be near, come near or low, let down, be akin to.

data.meanings: Erred, strayed, or went astray. Deviated from the right way or course. Missed or lost the right way. Lost something but does not know its place. Confounded or perplexed and unable to see the right course.Become hidden, unperceived, concealed, absent, or escaped. Went away.A lost state. A state of perishing, coming to naught, or passing away.Confusion, perplexity, and inability to see the right course.Skill in guiding, or directing aright, in journeying.One with whom is no good.Water running beneath a rock, or among trees, which the sun does not reach.Ragged land or ground, a hard and stony place.
data.sentence: The word ضَلَّ comes from the root ض ل ل and is associated with the meanings: Erred, strayed, or went astray. Deviated from the right way or course. Missed or lost the right way. Lost something but does not know its place. Confounded or perplexed and unable to see the right course.Become hidden, unperceived, concealed, absent, or escaped. Went away.A lost state. A state of perishing, coming to naught, or passing away.Confusion, perplexity, and inability to see the right course.Skill in guiding, or directing aright, in journeying.One with whom is no good.Water running beneath a rock, or among trees, which the sun does not reach.Ragged land or ground, a hard and stony place.

data.meanings: he walked or went along, to strive/exert/labour/work, go quickly, effort, endeavour, hasten/act/run, be active, diligent, age of running or work and assist (child).
data.sentence: The word سَعْيُهُمْ comes from the root س ع ي and is associated with the meanings: he walked or went along, to strive/exert/labour/work, go quickly, effort, endeavour, hasten/act/run, be active, diligent, age of running or work and assist (child).

data.meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
data.sentence: The word يَحْسَبُونَ comes from the root ح س ب and is associated with the meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.

data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word يُحْسِنُونَ comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.

data.meanings: to make/do/create/build, work a thing, nourish, bring up. sun'un - an act, that which is done. masna'un (pl. masani) - cistern, palace, citadel, fine building, fortress. san'atun - making, art of making.
data.sentence: The word صُنْعًا comes from the root ص ن ع and is associated with the meanings: to make/do/create/build, work a thing, nourish, bring up. sun'un - an act, that which is done. masna'un (pl. masani) - cistern, palace, citadel, fine building, fortress. san'atun - making, art of making.
